		<path d="M570.692,-0.096 L596.538,-0.096 L596.538,140.827 L570.692,140.827 L570.692,-0.096 Z"></path>
		<path d="M670.385,-0.096 L600.231,-0.096 L600.231,21.442 L622.385,21.442 L622.385,140.827 L648.231,140.827 L648.231,21.442 L670.385,21.442 L670.385,-0.096"></path>
		<path d="M776.846,-0.096 L776.846,74.365 L776.231,74.365 L752.846,-0.096 L727.615,-0.096 L727.615,122.98 L712.231,-0.096 L674.692,-0.096 L655,140.827 L676.539,140.827 L680.231,109.442 L701.154,109.442 L704.846,140.827 L749.769,140.827 L749.769,55.288 L750.385,55.288 L778.077,140.827 L798.385,140.827 L798.385,-0.096 L776.846,-0.096 L776.846,-0.096 Z M683.308,89.134 L691.308,21.442 L691.923,21.442 L699.308,89.134 L683.308,89.134 L683.308,89.134 Z"></path>
	</g>
</svg>


						</a>
					</h1>
				
														
												</div>
		</div>

					</header>




<nav class="nav" data-tracking-id="topNav">
	<div class="nav-bar">
		<div class="nav-bar-container">

				<span class="icon icon-menu"></span>
			</a>

	</div>

				data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/bdsm-1504696749.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*"

							
										
			data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/bdsm-1504696749.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=768:* 980w"
		
				title="BDSM&#x20;bondage"
		alt="bdsm,&#x20;bondage,&#x20;"
	/>

		
			
	</a>


		<div class="full-item-metadata">
					
<a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/uk/love-sex/sex/">
	Sex
</a>


							

			
	<div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-publish-date="2017-09-06T11:20:00Z" data-format="MMM D, YYYY">
		
		Sep 6, 2017
	</div>

		
	</div>

		<div class="full-item-content">

</a>

	</div>

		
	</div>

		<div class="full-item-content">
				
				




		
	
	




<a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/uk/worklife/a12182662/too-faced-beverly-hill-house-tour/">
	See inside the Too Faced founders' glam Beverly Hills home
</a>


							







<div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
	<p>It's like living inside your favourite eyeshadow palette.</p>
</div>

		
							<!-- shared/byline -->

		
	<div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">By			<span class="byline-name" rel="author" itemprop="name">
				Jessica Cumberbatch Anderson
			</span>
		
		
	</div>
<!-- / shared/byline -->

			</div>

			<script id="deferred-css-script-tag">( function( Modernizr ) {
	var d = document,
	ua = navigator.userAgent,
	reMobile = /Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Kindle|NetFront|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Fennec|Minimo|Opera M(obi|ini)|Blazer|Dolfin|Dolphin|Skyfire|Zune/ig;

	if ( Modernizr && Modernizr.addTest ) {
		Modernizr.addTest( "mobile", function() {
			return reMobile.test( ua ) && Modernizr.mq( "only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)" );
		} );

		Modernizr.addTest( "tablet", function() {
			return reMobile.test( ua ) && !Modernizr.mobile;
		} );
	}

	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/cosmopolitan/assets/css/homepage.574cce2.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/cosmopolitan/assets/css/homepage-mobile.1d0aaf6.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( Modernizr );
